metadata.title: CVE-2022-44370 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - low
metadata.description:
NASM v2.16 was discovered to contain a heap buffer overflow in thecomponent quote_for_pmake() asm/nasm.c:856

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-44370` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

nasm - 2.16.01-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nasm package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.16.01-1').
